__e: He put a pillow to his face and said he'd be dead in 15 seconds.
I just think... how easy it would be to hold a pillow over his face.
And honestly, I'm starting to think, hands around her throat, cushion over her face, anything to bring it to an end.
She just left a note on the pillow and left the country.
Every night, I put my head on my pillow and I wonder, "will I meet her tomorrow?"
I'll tell you one thing, you must go out and conquer the world.
I'll get you a blanket and a pillow for the night.
But if I do, can I put it under my pillow for the tooth fairy?
You really think you can sleep in his bed with him, and not use his penis as a body pillow?
